name: Lost Sector Bravo
description:
// Transmission Received

Lost Sector Bravo is a game I made while watching a Unity 2d tutorial. This is a space adventure game where you decide what to do! You can win, you can lose, & you can repeat playthroughs! Feel free to let me know what you think!

Currently, the game funnels to the end of section one. You could get there fairly quickly or take your time. I plan to expand section one in the future & develop the game past the first section!

--------------------------------------

Any of the characters or names I came up with on the spot simply to develop the game. Anything isn't meant to be similar to anything else. 

The game might take a minute to load!!

// Transmission Ended
